name: Link
desc: A control for navigating to a URL.

items.name: init(LocalizedStringKey, destination: URL)
items.desc: Creates a control, consisting of a URL and a title key, used to navigate to a URL.

items.name: init<S>(S, destination: URL)
items.desc: Creates a control, consisting of a URL and a title string, used to navigate to a URL.

items.name: init(destination: URL, label: () -> Label)
items.desc: Creates a control, consisting of a URL and a label, used to navigate to the given URL.

items.name: func font(Font?) -> some View
items.desc: Sets the default font for text in this view.

items.name: func foregroundColor(Color?) -> some View
items.desc: Sets the color of the foreground elements displayed by this view.

items.name: var body: some View
items.desc: The content and behavior of the view.

items.name: typealias Body
items.desc: The type of view representing the body of this view.
